title: Statistics Explained
cleaned_text: Welcome To Statistics Explained [Statistics Explained](/eurostat/statistics-explained/index.php?title=Statistics_Explained), your guide to European statistics. Statistics Explained is an official [Eurostat](/eurostat/statistics-explained/index.php?title=Glossary:Eurostat) website presenting statistical topics in an easily understandable way. Together, the articles make up an encyclopedia of European statistics for everyone, completed by a [statistical glossary](/eurostat/statistics-explained/index.php?title=Thematic_glossaries) clarifying all terms used and by numerous links to further information and the latest data and metadata, a portal for occasional and regular users.
